FuncDef: This command assigns a pre-configured lag link map profile to a SAP or network interface configured on a LAG or a PW port that exists on a LAG. Once assigned or de-assigned, the SAP or network interface egress traffic is re-hashed over LAG as required by the new configuration.

ParaDef.Info: Defines a unique LAG link map profile on which the LAG the SAP/network interface exist. ParamDefault: Default- 1 to 64
